pullRequest.title: Weighted Names
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR changes how name generation is performed and implements methods used in future MekHQ personnel PRs.
String[] generateGivenNameSurnameSplit is used in future MekHQ PRs for my personnel improvements.

commit.message: Adding a name generator that returns a divided given name and surname
Loading Names files now goes to weighted maps
Implementing random name generation using weighted trees
Switching to using three name maps instead of one to decrease the amount of copies of the same data held in memory
Adding comments to explain how the variables work

nodes.bodyText: Is this a list or a singular value?
This return name[1] = "Person" for clanners, should this instead be null or empty?
This should be marked as synchronized and there likely should be some locking occurring regarding initialized and initializing. As it stands this is not thread safe.
Should this be using the MM logger?
This puts a reliance on the filenames ending in .txt (all lower), so I'd add that comment above with the file names.

commit.message: Applying changes from review, and making the name generator properly threadsafe
Adding logic for clanners and default keys, so they instead default to using Clan instead of General if Clan exists
Added comments to explain how the faction key is being chosen
